author: The Associated Press
title: Israeli security agency says it arrested alleged Iran spy
description: Israel’s domestic security agency says it has arrested an Israeli citizen alleged to have spied for Iran
content:
JERUSALEM -- 
Israel's domestic security agency said Tuesday it arrested an Israeli citizen alleged to have spied for Iran.
The Shin Bet alleged in a statement the man was in contact with Iranian agents abroad, where he was given money, guidance and encrypt… [+1093 chars]
